main

Class PlayerDoubleBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.PlayerDoubleBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Destructable, Player

    public class PlayerDoubleBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Player
    An implementation of the Player interface which uses a double buffer to allow for continuous audio playback
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    EPICI

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int bufferSize
      Buffer size
      double volume
      Volume multiplier, default is fine since values will be shorts and the amplitude is expected to cap at 1.0
